metadata.defaultTitle: EdBrio — AI Report Generation x Student Management System
metadata.description: AI report generation and student management system for private tutors and tutoring center instructors. Simply enter lesson notes and AI automatically creates reports for parents/guardians. Manage bookings, payments, and student portfolios all in one place.
metadata.ogDescription: AI report generation and student management for private tutors and tutoring center instructors. AI automatically creates reports from lesson notes.
metadata.twitterDescription: Simply enter lesson notes and AI automatically creates reports for parents/guardians. A management system for private tutors and tutoring center instructors.
metadata.oneLiner: AI turns your lesson notes into parent-ready reports. The all-in-one management system for private tutors.
metadata.jsonLdDescription: AI report generation and student management system for private tutors

landing.alphaNotice: This system is currently in alpha testing. You may encounter issues during use.

hero.badge: Cut admin time by 2/3 with AI report generation
hero.description: EdBrio is a management system for private tutors and tutoring center instructors. AI automatically generates parent/guardian reports from your post-lesson notes.

flow.step1Note: Grasped the basics of quadratic equations. Struggled with applied problems.
flow.step2ReportContent: We studied the quadratic formula. Basic calculations were performed accurately. On applied problems...

features.sectionDescription: LINE, Excel, banking apps, planners. EdBrio smartly integrates all those scattered tools.
features.aiReportDescription: Simply enter your post-lesson notes and AI automatically generates polished reports for parents/guardians. Professional reports including comprehension levels, homework, and next lesson plans are created in seconds.
features.studentKarteDescription: Centrally manage learning goals, weak points, and strengths. Visualize teaching strategies for each student and ensure smooth handoffs between instructors.
features.schedulingDescription: Just add events to your calendar and monthly billing is calculated automatically. Manage makeup lessons without any mistakes.
features.paymentsDescription: With Stripe integration, automate everything from invoice delivery to payment confirmation. Free yourself from the hassle of cash and bank transfer verification.

useCases.tutorDescription: Cut report writing from 30 minutes to 5 minutes with AI generation. Focus on building trust with parents/guardians.
useCases.jukuDescription: Centralize information sharing among multiple instructors with student portfolios. Handoff notes ensure smooth coverage during substitute lessons.
useCases.onlineDescription: Complete everything online from booking management to report sharing and payments. Focus on teaching from anywhere.

pricing.sectionDescription: Scaled to your needs. Start with a free trial.
pricing.freeReports: Up to 5 AI reports per month
pricing.standardDescription: * 30-day free trial. Cancel anytime during the trial for ¥0.

feeExplanation.title: How Fees Work
feeExplanation.description: Ticket payment fees consist of two components: the EdBrio platform fee and the Stripe payment processing fee (3.6%).
feeExplanation.breakevenTitle: When Standard Plan Becomes Worth It
feeExplanation.breakevenDescription: The fee difference is 5.6%. To recoup the monthly ¥1,480 subscription through fee savings, your monthly revenue should be approximately ¥26,500 or more.
feeExplanation.feeNote: * Fees include Stripe payment processing fee (3.6%). Standard total cost includes the monthly ¥1,480 subscription.
feeExplanation.freePlanLimitation: Additionally, the Free plan is limited to 2 students and 5 AI reports per month. The Standard plan is required for 3 or more students.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate are the AI-generated reports?
faq.a1: Using Claude AI, reports are generated in natural language based on the content of your lesson notes. You can also edit the reports after generation, so you can adjust them to match your style.
faq.q2: Do parents need to install an app?
faq.a2: No, they don't. Parents/guardians can simply log in from their browser to view reports and check learning progress. It works on smartphones, tablets, and PCs.
faq.q3: What happens when the free trial period ends?
faq.a3: You will be automatically transitioned to the Standard plan. If you cancel from the dashboard during the trial period, you will not be charged at all. After cancellation, the Free plan (2 students, 5 AI reports/month) remains available.
faq.a4: With Supabase (PostgreSQL) Row Level Security, each user can only access their own data. All communications are encrypted with HTTPS. Payment information is managed by Stripe — no card data is ever stored on EdBrio.
faq.q5: Can I use the Free plan indefinitely?
faq.a5: Yes, there is no time limit on the Free plan. You can continue using it for free as long as you stay within the 2 student and 5 AI reports per month limits.
faq.q6: Can I use EdBrio without the payment (ticket) feature?
faq.a6: Absolutely. AI reports, student portfolios, calendar, and other features are all available without Stripe payment integration. The payment feature is entirely optional.
faq.q7: Can a parent connect with multiple instructors?
faq.a7: Yes, a parent/guardian account can be linked to multiple instructors. You can manage all your child's reports and bookings from different tutors in one place.
faq.q8: Can I use it on my phone only?
faq.a8: Yes, EdBrio is a responsive web app. You can access all features from your smartphone's browser. No app installation is required.
